info.name: Steam - Holiday Profile 2014
info.description: The Holiday Profile 2014 is finally here on usertstyles.org! If you have missed the chance to get this profile, or you simply want to use this profile permanently, then here you have it! ❄️ Merry Xmas everyone! Feel free to share it with all your friends! (The Holiday Profile 2019 is now available!) [ Version: 9 | View change logs ]
info.additionalInfo:
IMPORTANT: For bug reports, please use Twitter and send me a tweet or a direct message with the link of your issue after posting it in the discussions down below! I don't receive any notifications when somebody is using the Discussions/Feedback button.
Work in progress: View GIF A brand new notification button is on its way to make things look a bit more modern. I'm just not decided with the style of the button yet. Also I worked on a snow machine! I believe I already added it before to the Steam Holiday Profile 2015. But now it's gonna be an option to turn on and off.
I re-created this profile for people who could not get their hands on this Holiday profile or simply because they did not want to waste their precious money on it since this add-on will disappear forever on January 2015. Please note that the small animated characters hiding in the snow of the featured showcase header may or may not be implemented in the stylish code due to the CSS limitation. However, with CSS3, it is possible to animate them using @keyframes but it is a lot of work to animate them.
